sage.scripting

Interface IScript

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BehaviorScript, DataScript

    public interface IScript
    The IScript interface exposes the public methods that all Scripts must implement.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute()
      Executes (evaluates) the script.
      boolean getHasBeenModified()
      Returns TRUE if the script has been modified since the last check to getHasBeenModified(); FALSE otherwise.
      boolean getIsRecentlyExecuted()
      Returns TRUEFALSE otherwise.
      boolean getIsValid()
      Returns TRUE if the script has been fully initialized and is functional; FALSE otherwise.
      java.lang.String getScriptFileExtension()
      Returns the filename of the script.
      java.lang.Object getVariable(java.lang.String variableName)
      Returns the value of a script variable.
      void setIsRecentlyExecuted(boolean b)
      Set whether or not the script has been executed recently.
      void setVariable(java.lang.String variableName, java.lang.Object variableValue)
      Sets the value of a script variable.

    • Method Detail

      • getIsValid

        boolean getIsValid()
        Returns TRUE if the script has been fully initialized and is functional; FALSE otherwise.

      • getHasBeenModified

        boolean getHasBeenModified()
        Returns TRUE if the script has been modified since the last check to getHasBeenModified(); FALSE otherwise.

      • getIsRecentlyExecuted

        boolean getIsRecentlyExecuted()
        Returns TRUEFALSE otherwise.

      • setIsRecentlyExecuted

        void setIsRecentlyExecuted(boolean b)
        Set whether or not the script has been executed recently.

      • getScriptFileExtension

        java.lang.String getScriptFileExtension()
        Returns the filename of the script. This is only the name of the file and not the path to the directory the file is located in.

      • execute

        void execute()
        Executes (evaluates) the script.

      • getVariable

        java.lang.Object getVariable(java.lang.String variableName)
        Returns the value of a script variable.
        Parameters:
        variableName - - The name of the script variable.

      • setVariable

        void setVariable(java.lang.String variableName,
                 java.lang.Object variableValue)
        Sets the value of a script variable.
        Parameters:
        variableName - - The name of the script variable.
        variableValue - - The value to set the variable to.
